items.headline: Elon Musk is richer now than John Rockefeller was — and it still might not be enough for his ambitions
items.summary_en: Rockefeller Rich still rolls off the tongue better, but Elon Musk can now be considered the wealthiest person who ever lived after Forbes’ new ranking.

items.headline: ‘I don’t come from money’: I received $1.2 million after a family tragedy. Am I foolish to keep it in a money-market account?

items.headline: Cracks are forming in the AI capex boom, warns Morgan Stanley. What to buy and sell.

items.headline: As Buffett nears retirement, he’s making his biggest purchase in years

items.headline: Energy is the best play, and the market’s biggest risk, for the fourth quarter, this research firm says
items.summary_en: Energy prices are abnormally low and supportive of equity markets everywhere. If they were to spike, however, this would represent the biggest risk to the current investment environment.
